content: On our call last week, the FMG approved a policy requiring that FHIR implementation guides going to ballot in the January 2020 cycle or being published after the start of the January cycle SHALL use either the HL7 FHIR standard template or one otherwise approved by the FMG (e.g. the Da Vinci template). Any exception requires FMG approval - which should be sought well in advance. If you have any questions, please raise them on the #committers or #IG creation stream.
